articles.description: KRANJSKA GORA, Slovenia (AP) — The emotions came pouring out of Mikaela Shiffrin  when she matched Lindsey Vonn’s  women’s World Cup skiing record  with her 82nd win Sunday.
articles.content:
KRANJSKA GORA, Slovenia (AP) The emotions came pouring out of Mikaela Shiffrin when she matched Lindsey Vonns womens World Cup skiing record with her 82nd win Sunday.
